com.jeremielc.renanime.fileManagement

Class FileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jeremielc.renanime.fileManagement.FileManager

  • public class FileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all methods to manage files (retrieve a list of files and rename them).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileManager()
      Instanciate the file manager with a directory path set by default to the user home directory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void renameAnimeFiles(java.lang.String animeName, java.util.TreeSet<AnimeFile> listOfAnimeFiles, java.util.List<java.lang.String> listOfTitles, boolean isThereTitles)
      Allow to rename files in bulk following the format "Anime name - Episode xx - Episode title.ext"
      void retrieveAnimeData(java.lang.String animeId, Anime anime)
      Allow to get the anime's title and the url where to find episodes titles from a file.
      java.util.TreeSet<AnimeFile> retrieveAnimeFiles()
      Let the user choose multiple files to rename.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileManager

        public FileManager()
        Instanciate the file manager with a directory path set by default to the user home directory.

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveAnimeFiles

        public java.util.TreeSet<AnimeFile> retrieveAnimeFiles()
        Let the user choose multiple files to rename.
        Returns:
        A list of files, selected by the user.

      • renameAnimeFiles

        public void renameAnimeFiles(java.lang.String animeName,
                             java.util.TreeSet<AnimeFile> listOfAnimeFiles,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> listOfTitles,
                             boolean isThereTitles)
        Allow to rename files in bulk following the format "Anime name - Episode xx - Episode title.ext"
        Parameters:
        animeName - A string representing the name of the anime.
        listOfAnimeFiles - The list of file to rename.
        listOfTitles - List of episodes titles.
        isThereTitles - Indicate if titles must be writen or not. True if titles must be present in the file name, false otherwise.

      • retrieveAnimeData

        public void retrieveAnimeData(java.lang.String animeId,
                              Anime anime)
        Allow to get the anime's title and the url where to find episodes titles from a file.
        Parameters:
        animeId - A string representing the MyAnimeList ID number of the episode.
        anime - An anime object to store data.
